name: Video Player
description: A video playback application for NextUI featuring local video playback, YouTube streaming, and online TV.
author: mohammadsyuhada

changelog.v1.0.2: Added support for multiple audio/subtitle tracks and optimize playback for HEVC and improve OSD titles
changelog.v1.0.1: Added external subtitle and bluetooth support. Also several bug fixes
changelog.v1.0.0: Initial release with local video playback, YouTube streaming, and online TV support
